entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
